Any tips for subbing mobile line with phone? Assuming company pays. I'm seeing the current plans from starhub  m1 and singtel are very lousy ever since mvnos got popular

it is best to opt for cash refund when doing tax refund at departmental store global tax refund  certain store will do the tax refund deduction from final bill on the spot in japan  like clothing (uniqlo  eu)  pharmacy and places like loft  just need to go to special counter and tell them tax free. do note that not all stores under same merchant will have tax free options.
ichange but u need to pay for atm withdrawal fee.
when u do a tax refund to card u are subjected to the exchange rate by bank so best to get cash from the tax refund counter and just use it at merchant that dont take card.

oh forgot to mention  japanese very book by book  the card use must match your passport name  even if the card is using christian name but not in your passport they will ask alot  judging by this i think they will also be rigid when u request tax refund to a different card that is not use for the spending
